channel.title: Ranging Help?
channel.description:
On my server when I train range you can't far-range, you have to be right next to the npc.. How do I make it so that you CAN far-range?
Also.. The dark bow (and some other bows) give melee exp not range exp.. How do I fix this?
Any help is highly appreciated.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 14, 2008, 07:56:08 PM[/size][hr]Can anyone help me?
